actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-966.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #167 (367-13).

official_title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and study authorized by a Resolution adopted on February 3, 1977, by the Committee on International Relations.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-966) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $375,000, for a certain investigation and study to be conducted by the House Committee on International Relations, acting through its Subcommittee on International Organizations.

titles.title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and study authorized by a Resolution adopted on February 3, 1977, by the Committee on International Relations.
